aboutSpeaker.title: About the teacher
aboutSpeaker.hobby: I like design and programming. I'm not very good at managing, but I'm good at doing things with my hands. I help people as a mentor in my spare time.
aboutSpeaker.about: I will teach you to write texts for different channels and audiences. Orients on what to focus on in career development.

Courses.title: Choose the direction you like

price.fullprice: upon full payment of the course

Courses.topicList: Catch topics that will be in this course:

leadership.description: This is a course that will reveal your ability to influence others, inspire and lead a team
leadership.about: Do you feel your influence on the environment, do you have healthy ambitions, and most importantly, you do care about what is happening around you and are you ready to take responsibility for yourself? Well, then the 'Leadership' course will definitely help you master the first steps on ways to develop leadership skills. Studying leadership can contribute to the formation of a comprehensively developed personality and preparation for the challenges of the modern world. You can definitely become a TOP leader, just start your journey!
leadership.text: Hey, hey, what, are you ready? We are launching a new course, we will explore the topic of 'Leadership' and not just for a reason, but by revealing important questions, join us it will be very interesting!

topic.topic1: Concepts and styles of leadership. Retrospective and present
topic.topic2: Development of leadership in modern realities
topic.topic8: An intellectual leader. Who is he?
topic.topic9: Leadership and management: common and different?

business.description: Will give you the opportunity to highlight the commercial spirit in you, direct potential into the development and monetization of your own idea for the purpose of making a profit
business.about: Each of us at least once in our life has thought about what kind of work to do in order not to depend on someone, to receive income and manage the business independently. Did such thoughts come to you too? Do you have an idea but don't know where to start? Well, we can tell you how to monetize even a crazy idea! Business is a risk, but if it is well-developed, it can definitely be profitable. And first, we will teach you to understand economic processes, teach you financial literacy, and stimulate your entrepreneurial activity. And you will have the opportunity to meet and talk with businessmen who created themselves from scratch. They will tell you how they gained a  success!
business.text: Did you wait for our news? Are you interested in which course will hit the masses next? Let's hurry to start!!!!!!!!!! One, two, three...catch! Business - new classes on the following topics:

topic.topic7: School of professions. Familiarity and motivation

politicalScienceSociology.description: Will help you deepen your understanding of political phenomena and social processes, as well as their interaction and impact on society
politicalScienceSociology.about: Hey, are you worried about what is happening in politics? Thinking about how to improve the social situation in your country and dreaming of economic growth of Ukraine? Then you need to dig deeper and gain solid knowledge in the field of political science-sociology. Real changes are in your hands!
politicalScienceSociology.text: We are ready to launch a new direction of Political science-sociology, are you interested in this direction?

topic.topic2: Politics and political life of society
topic.topic5: Political elite and leadership, State in the political system
topic.topic6: Civil society and the rule of law
topic.topic9: Socio-political ideologies and currents in the modern world
topic.topic15: Functions of sociology and its role in the development of society

innovativeTechnologies.description: Allows you to learn about new advanced methods used to improve or create new products, services or processes, contributing to technological progress and improved results
innovativeTechnologies.about: Are you in a hurry so as not to miss new trends in innovative technologies? If you want to get to know and master new skills that can very quickly bring you income and benefit others, then it's time to get acquainted with Innovative technologies, including (Game Dev, UI/UX Design, QA, AI)
innovativeTechnologies.text: Hey guys, what's next? Are you ready for our news? We are launching another direction and in it we want to introduce our cool friends and partners Beetroot Academy, who know exactly everything about IT and will best introduce you to this profession. They organize and conduct training on:

art.description: You will be able to understand the heritage of human creativity, connect with the beautiful and create something even greater, your ideas will have a place in implementation
art.about: Artistic, innovative, can you create cool things with your own hands? And how often do you look at the paintings of famous artists, follow fashion trends, and new trends in design? If you are interested in creativity, you enjoy art, you like to draw, you have your own vision and know how to express it, try yourself in the direction of ART (Moldern ART, Design). Qualified specialists will be able to support you in your creative impulse.
art.text: A question for the studio, have you ever been interested in art? Yes, cool! Because we have prepared a great course for you, which will introduce you to different directions and styles of art, as well as teach you how to create something of your own - unique! It is hard to imagine that this is possible in the 21st century, in the era of AI, but we are sure that the human hand and intelligence will always be valued! So, don't delay, get involved! The following curiosities await you:

topic.topic5: Minimalism in art or the art of minimalism

careerCounselin.description: This important component will definitely come in handy when choosing a profession, the consultant will help you find out your interests and goals, plan your career, develop a strategy for self-improvement, prepare you for entering the labor market, teach you how to manage your career
careerCounselin.about: Do you have questions about what to do next in life, how to make the right choice and realize yourself? We think that this is a rather important stage and it can be difficult for you, so we offer you the professional help of highly qualified specialists. Career counseling helps them understand their interests, skills and goals in order to make informed decisions about choosing a career path. Consultants can help pupils and students in determining fields of activity, studying universities, as well as providing advice on passing entrance exams and preparing documents. Consultants will help develop a specific career plan, determine short-term and long-term goals, as well as ways to achieve them. Career counseling/Career guidance is an important stage in your development, so don't miss your chance.
careerCounselin.text: Can't decide on your future profession? The question 'What do you want to be when you grow up?' already caught up with you... Parents say one thing, but you want another, we will help! Join the Career counseling/Career guidance course and we will improve your skills so that the choice is 100% successful!

topic.topic7: Portfolio, resume, interview, what is it?
topic.topic9: Getting to know the most successful students of Ukraine

Partners.title: Hey folks, look at the incredible partners working with Mindlab!
Partners.question: Do you want to get to know them better?
Partners.partnersList: Mushroom Academy, Kyiv metropolitan educational institution named, Kyiv Children's Academy, Ukranian Cosmic Education.
Partners.text: We have something to be proud of, because our partners have become:

patrners1.title: Mushroom Academy
patrners1.description: Mushroom Academy is a Western Ukrainian IT school. For more than 19 years, they have been helping Ukrainians to build a successful career in the digital economy: they educate the next generation of IT citizens, develop the IT cluster, and help those who need it.

patrners2.title: Kyiv metropolitan educational institution named
patrners2.description: The mission of our institution is to help everyone in integral development and leadership formation, to serve the person, community, and society. Quality training, innovative curriculars and high-level research are our priorities.

patrners3.title: Kyiv Children's Academy
patrners3.description: The Kyiv Children's Academy is a leader in extracurricular education in Ukraine, a platform for testing and implementing innovations, and contributes to the development of scientific education in the Eastern European region. We teach you to make discoveries and create your future!

patrners4.title: Ukranian Cosmic Education
patrners4.description: Ukranian Cosmic Education is an educational space that influences changes in Ukrainian society. Helps students find their place in the world by inspiring them to personal growth, academic achievement and leadership for the common good. Ukranian Cosmic Education is an educational space that influences changes in Ukrainian society.

Parents.title: Information for parents
Parents.information: Dear parents, if you have any questions about the courses, the platform, MindLab activities, contact us in the chat or by mail.

platform.name: Platform
platform.description: The educational and social platform MindLab Hub for teenagers and young adults is an innovative and safe center created for development, learning and interaction. We strive to provide the young and gifted generation with the opportunity to gain knowledge, gather inspiration, find their own path in life and plan their career. These components will allow to support motivated young people - future leaders who will contribute to the development of Ukraine.
platform.inforvation: We introduce young people to the following areas: Leadership, business, political science and sociology, modern technologies, art, career counseling and career support, which help students expand their knowledge and skills.

spiker.name: Speakers and mentors
spiker.description: The platform provides an opportunity to listen to lectures and receive advice from well-known specialists in various fields. Interactive webinars and interviews with successful personalities inspire and help students understand their capabilities.

guidanc.name: Career guidance
guidanc.description: The offered career guidance tools help to determine one's own strengths and weaknesses, reveal possible career paths and help in choosing a future profession.

counseling.name: Career Counseling
counseling.description: On the platform, there is an opportunity to receive advice from professional career consultants who will help determine a career development strategy and draw up a plan to achieve the set goals. Consultants represent a galaxy of successful businessmen, politicians and well-known personalities in various spheres of activity.

comunication.name: Communication
comunication.description: This platform can help with communication between teenagers, students, teachers, mentors, MindLab Hub creates a space for virtual communication, exchange of ideas and experiences between participants. This helps to form friendships, exchange knowledge and support.
comunication.inforvation: We help students build a network of connections, in particular with university representatives. With the help of our platform, users will be able to make educational choices, discuss study details and get advice from students and graduates. Our platform aims to be a virtual partner in development and self-improvement for every teenager, providing tools and resources for their future success.
